gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set contains daily, gridded snow cover and albedo derived from radiance data acquired by the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) on board the Terra satellite. Snow cover is identified using the Normalized Difference Snow Index (NDSI) and a series of screens designed to alleviate errors and flag uncertain snow cover detections.

eos:description.gco:CharacterString: Horizontal tile number of a grid which increases from left to right
Version of the process software that generated the product.
Percent of pixels with good quality
Percent of pixels not produced due to some reason other than cloud
Percent of pixels with not so good quality
Percent of granule that was identified as snow covered; % based on area of granule (swath or tile).
MODIS Land tile identification number which represents a geographical area on the surface of the Earth bounded by latitude and longitude coordinates.
Vertical tile number of a grid, which increases from top to bottom.
Digital object identifier that uniquely identifies this data product
URL of the digital object identifier resolving authority
